headline: CH Robinson (CHRW) Touches Fresh Record on Double-Digit Profit Gain, Bullish Outlook
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks with Outstanding Gains; 9 on Record Highs. CH Robinson Worldwide, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHRW) is one of the best-performing stocks on Thursday. CH Robinson surged to a fresh record high on Thursday, as investor sentiment was bolstered by a double-digit surge in net profits and a higher growth outlook for full-year 2026. […]

headline: C.H. Robinson (CHRW): Margin Recovery Challenges Views on Sustainability After Years of Earnings Decline
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) posted a 4.5% annual revenue growth forecast, lagging behind the broader US market’s 10.3% expectation. EPS is projected to rise 7.57% per year, also slower than the market’s 15.7%. The company’s net profit margin improved to 3.1% from 1.9% last year, and recent annual earnings growth jumped 60.9%, standing out against a longer-term average annual decline of 11.5%. Investors are seeing signs of near-term improvement in profitability, but the uptick comes after...

headline: C.H. Robinson (CHRW) Is Up 23.5% After Raising 2026 Outlook and Approving $2B Buyback
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc. recently reported third-quarter results, with net income rising to US$163 million on revenue of US$4.14 billion, and also raised its 2026 operating income guidance to a new range of US$965 million to US$1.04 billion despite freight market headwinds. The company attributed these improvements to ongoing gains from its AI-driven operating model and authorized a new US$2 billion share repurchase program, highlighting its confidence in further boosting profitability...
